CustomField.description: This field is populated when Pendo_Appointments_Booked_Last_30_Days__c moves from 0 to 1 for the first time. It is used in onboarding metrics to see time to first booking.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is populated when Pendo_Appointments_Booked_Last_30_Days__c moves from 0 to 1 for the first time. It is used in onboarding metrics to see time to first booking.
CustomField.label: First Appointment Booked Date
